org.apache.zab

Class MessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zab.MessageBuilder

  • public final class MessageBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class used for creating protobuf messages.

    • Method Detail

      • buildProposedEpoch

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildProposedEpoch(int epoch)
        Creates CEPOCH message.
        Parameters:
        epoch - the last proposed epoch.
        Returns:
        the protobuf message.

      • buildNewEpochMessage

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildNewEpochMessage(int epoch)
        Creates a NEW_EPOCH message.
        Parameters:
        epoch - the new proposed epoch number.
        Returns:
        the protobuf message.

      • buildAckEpoch

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildAckEpoch(int epoch,
                               Zxid lastZxid)
        Creates a ACK_EPOCH message.
        Parameters:
        epoch - the last leader proposal the follower has acknowledged.
        lastZxid - the last zxid of the follower.
        Returns:
        the protobuf message.

      • buildInvalidMessage

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildInvalidMessage(byte[] content)
        Creates an INVALID message. This message will not be transmitted among workers. It's created when protobuf fails to parse the byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        content - the byte array which can't be parsed by protobuf.
        Returns:
        a message represents an invalid message.

      • buildPullTxnReq

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildPullTxnReq(Zxid lastZxid)
        Creates a PULL_TXN_REQ message to ask follower sync its history to leader.
        Parameters:
        lastZxid - the last transaction id of leader, the sync starts one after this transaction (not including this one).
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.

      • buildProposal

        public static ZabMessage.Message buildProposal(Zxid transactionId,
                               ByteBuffer body)
        Creates a PROPOSAL message.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the transaction id of this proposal.
        body - the content of this transaction.
        Returns:
        a protobuf message.
